ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
// java.log(result)
var su=source.key;
function fn(value){
if(/验证码/.test(value)){
	      imgurl = `${su}/searchVerify/captcha`;
       img = java.ajax(imgurl)
	      code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
       data=java.post(`${su}/search`,`searchkey=${java.get('key')}&code=${code}`,{}).body()
       return fn(data)
   }else{
    return value
   }
}
result = fn(result)
</js>
